data.title: Almere City FC live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Almere City FC live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Almere City FC live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Almere City FC next match

Almere City FC will play the next match against Fortuna Sittard on Aug 16, 2024, 6:00:00 PM UTC in Eredivisie.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Fortuna Sittard vs Almere City FC live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Almere City FC matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Almere City FC previous match

Almere City FC previous match was against AZ Alkmaar in Eredivisie, the match ended with result 0 - 1 (AZ Alkmaar won the match).

Almere City FC fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Almere City FC scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Almere City FC performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Almere City FC matches.

Current Almere City FC players

Forward: Baptiste Guillaume, Thomas Robinet, Kornelius Hansen, Faiz Mattoir, Jeffry Puriel Midfielder: Adi Nalić, Àlex Carbonell, Jochem Ritmeester van de Kamp, Logan Delaurier-Chaubet, Stije Resink, Alex Balboa, Alejandro Bandeira, Guus Beaumont Defender: Vassilis Zagaritis, Hamdi Akujobi, Sherel Floranus, Theo Barbet, Ricardo Visus, Christopher Mamengi, Joey Jacobs, Jaden Pinas, Jay Kuiper Goalkeeper: Nordin Bakker, Jonas Wendlinger, Stijn Keller

The current Almere City FC roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Almere City FC top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
